artist: Wendy-O Matik; Publisher: Manic D Press, San Francisco
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
inscription: Title page, black ink pen: For fly, / In the struggle / for an alternative / expression, your art and / words and beauty / and energy / have not gone unnoticed. I wish I'd / had more time in NY, But I am thankful / that our paths crossed for a moment... beacuse / words build bridges and that's how friendships / begin... Love + Support / always, / Wendy-O / '94
life_date: Wendy-O Matik ; Manic D Press, San Francisco, Publisher
title: She Knew Better
